BR_text.BRsummary: Installation needs to check default python
BR_text.BRdescription: If the default python of the installed virtualenv is python3x then the installation will fail.  The install script should explicitly supply the --python=python27 flag to the virtualenv command.

comments_0.comment_text: Good point.  We'll roll this fix out with the next release, but longer term we do plan to support python3 as well
